Articles.Content:
What happened to him, haven't heard anything about him in a month?

all i have heard is a rumor that he is in the hospital.

You would think that being in the hospital would be a great opportunity to play some KSP.

Joking aside, hopefully everything is ok.

Who is this guy?

He's a youtuber. Check out his channel, and you'll be wondering when he'll be back too.
im not sure he is in the hospital just, i saw a rumor on his channel that he was, it wasn't official.

I'm worried about him as well. I like the way he tells his KSP stories.

Let's hope he isn't dead.

I'm worried about him as well. I like the way he tells his KSP stories.

Let's hope he isn't dead.

We'd know if he was dead. The hospital would probably contact YouTube, so they'd know that the account will no longer be used.

Guys, he said it'd be a while until a new series started. I'm sure he's fine.

Just in case he isn't: Quick! Post HD pictures of bread!
macey dean hasn't said anything since mid-july, if he has please link it.

Guys, he said it'd be a while until a new series started. I'm sure he's fine.

Just in case he isn't: Quick! Post HD pictures of bread!

Um ok...

Back on point it is probably taking a long time to sift through the submissions.
if he was sifting through submissions he would atleast say 1 thing.

That's not an HD picture of bread! 225x225px - for shame..

Anywho, I'm sure Macey is all good and is just taking a break from making his insanely awesome videos; everyone needs a break once in a while.

I'm going to close up this thread as we don't want to be starting rumours now.
